title: Effect of the combined action of Quercus cortex extract and probiotic substances on the immunity and productivity of broiler chickens.
abstract: This study was designed to investigate the synergistic effect of the combined action of probiotic bacterial strains (Bifidobacterium adolescentis and Lactobacillus acidophilus) and Quercus cortex extract as biologically active substances in the feed on the immunity and productivity of Gallus gallus domesticus.
